description: A recent cyberattack on Hoya Corporation was conducted by the 'Hunters International' ransomware operation, which demanded a $10 million ransom for a file decryptor and not to release files stolen during the attack. [...]
title: Optics giant Hoya hit with $10 million ransomware demand

description: An almost 6-year-old vulnerability in the Lighttpd web server used in Baseboard Management Controllers has been overlooked by many device vendors, including Intel and Lenovo. [...]
title: Intel and Lenovo servers impacted by 6-year-old BMC flaw

description: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) is investigating the recent breach of data analytics company Sisense, an incident that also impacted critical infrastructure organizations. [...]
title: CISA says Sisense hack impacts critical infrastructure orgs

description: Apple has been notifying iPhone users in 92 countries about a "mercenary spyware attack" attempting to remotely compromise their device. [...]
title: Apple: Mercenary spyware attacks target iPhone users in 92 countries

description: Employee offboarding isn't anybody's favorite task—but it's a critical IT process that needs to be executed diligently and efficiently. Learn more from Nudge Security on automating offboarding of users in a secure manner. [...]
title: How to automate up to 90% of IT offboarding tasks

description: DuckDuckGo has launched a new paid-for 3-in-1 subscription service called 'Privacy Pro,' which includes a virtual private network (VPN), a personal data removal service, and an identity theft restoration solution. [...]
title: DuckDuckGo launches a premium Privacy Pro VPN service
